infos.value: A company of monks is headed this way.
It is highly likely that they are being led by Sadali.
Is it possible that he has grown suspicious of us?
No, sir. We haven't observed any indication that they doubt our intentions.
Then we might catch them off guard.
There has been no sight of Muraga...or any of Fennes's soldiers, for that matter.
Perhaps Fennes remains on the battlefield.
It would seem Sadali plans to return to Dynverk Cathedral.
Now I, King Robb of Hourne, shall repay them in kind for their crimes of deception!
Inform the army. We march in full force!
We will storm into battle against the monks of the Sanctum!
Trample them into the dirt! Paint the earth red with the miserable bastards' blood!
